about_the_game:
Additional content for those who wish to support further development of Armored Battle Crew.

Includes:

  • Armored Battle Crew Soundtrack
  • 10 Unique British Themed decals
  • 3 Unique Dazzle skins

Armored Battle Crew Soundtrack

  • 1 - Combat Awaits (00:50)
  • 2 - One Pace Forward (00:48)
  • 3 - Marching On (01:51)
  • 4 - We Stand Together (02:12)
  • 5 - Men Of Steel (02:09)
  • 6 - Heroes Never Die (02:39)
  • 7 - Final Attack (01:21)
  • 8 - Interlude (Victory) (00:10)
  • 9 - Happy and Glorious (01:04)
  • 10 - Interlude (Defeat) (00:10)
  • 11 - Aftermath (02:08)
  • 12 - Over The Top (01:36)

*OST will be located at your steam installation directory ...\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Armored Battle Crew WW1\OST

*All DLC decals and skins can be found in-game via the Paint tab in the Garage. Set the Category filter to 'DLC' to gain quick access to the DLC content
detailed_description:
Additional content for those who wish to support further development of Armored Battle Crew.

Includes:

  • Armored Battle Crew Soundtrack
  • 10 Unique British Themed decals
  • 3 Unique Dazzle skins

Armored Battle Crew Soundtrack

  • 1 - Combat Awaits (00:50)
  • 2 - One Pace Forward (00:48)
  • 3 - Marching On (01:51)
  • 4 - We Stand Together (02:12)
  • 5 - Men Of Steel (02:09)
  • 6 - Heroes Never Die (02:39)
  • 7 - Final Attack (01:21)
  • 8 - Interlude (Victory) (00:10)
  • 9 - Happy and Glorious (01:04)
  • 10 - Interlude (Defeat) (00:10)
  • 11 - Aftermath (02:08)
  • 12 - Over The Top (01:36)

*OST will be located at your steam installation directory ...\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Armored Battle Crew WW1\OST

*All DLC decals and skins can be found in-game via the Paint tab in the Garage. Set the Category filter to 'DLC' to gain quick access to the DLC content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel quad-core and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 620m or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Window 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel quad-core and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Additional decals, skins and the game soundtrack for those who wish to support further development of Armored Battle Crew.
